subtitle.Text: You know there was kind of thisâ€¦ intellectual, cross-cultural, like pen pal thing that happened before the internet,
you know, we used to write letters back and forth to each other about our ideas and about how we wanted to change things.
And so a bunch of these women that I mentioned came up with this idea of riot grrrl, of being a punk rocker that was also an in-your-face feminist.
